Nightmare nodded, smoke hazing above his head as he did it. He walked
over to the rubble, and put down Jagged very gently. He then moved
Needlenose out of the way, and began to swat pieces of ruble out of the
way, clearing Spinister. He hoisted Spinister over his shoulder, then
grabbed Jagged and Needlenose, and lifted them off the ground by their
arms, then headed back to the CR chambers. He placed each once in
carefully, then entered one of his own, and set it on the same setting
as Jaggeds, replication of Alien lifeform.

Apeface trudged over to the hole in the side of the ship, as Spasma rode
on his back. "We take to the air?" He asked Quake.
